title: LoL OCE servers screwed?
body: I can't connect to LoL OCE it continues to say http error anyone got a solution?

replies.body: Im with Vodafone and I cant! It aint optus.

Yep, its f&$king Optus again.  

Tried on Optus cable - Can't connect.
Tried on Optus mobile Wi-Fi hotspot - Can't connect.
Tried on Telstra mobile Wi-Fi hotspot - CAN connect !!!

I suggest everyone ring Optus support immediately.  I don't want to be the only idiot trying to explain this problem to those support numpties.

I can't connect either.  Same error, see attached image.  Been getting this error all evening.  I'm on Optus Cable on the Burwood (VIC) node.

The error reads:

"Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your Internet
 connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access."

Yep that's what I have

EDIT - I'm using optus too, could this be another optus screw up?
Yep. It could easily be another Optus screw up.  That's it I'm done.  Time to pay the extra for Telstra Cable.
